meanings: (TV·수도꼭지 등을) turn on, (스위치) switch on, (음악을) play

vlive.korean: 틀어~ Turn it on. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 헤이 수빈~ 우쥬크박스 다시 틀어줘😘🎧(WJSN’s juke box with human speaker)
틀어. Turn it on. 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2017 Live] 13 유겸 뱀뱀
호우! - 대신 부드러운 음악을 틀어놔야 돼요 알았죠? Wow. - But you need to play soft music. Right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! 주접특강] 2PM 영역🐼🐨 (Jun.K&NICHKHUN reading lovely comments)
vlive.english: Wow. - But you need to play soft music. Right?

vlive.korean: [며칠 뒤 성호의 개인 작업실에 모인 성균관대 꾼] 일단 비트를 한번 틀어볼까? [GGUN gathered at Seongho's studio] Shall we listen to the beat first? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
vlive.english: [GGUN gathered at Seongho's studio] Shall we listen to the beat first?

vlive.korean: 하나 하나... 틀어줄까요? Shall we hear... One at a time? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: Shall we hear... One at a time?
